summary: New characters: Zametov. New connections: Dmitri-Zossimov (acquaintance), Dmitri-Nastasya (friend), Zametov-Rodion (acquaintance), Dmitri-Praskovya (relation) and 1 more.
summary_short: Introduces Zametov. Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (18 ties). Key relationship types: acquaintance, friend, relation.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (18), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (9), Avdotya Romanovna (9), Sonia Marmeladov (7)
Key ties: Dmitri-Zossimov (acquaintance), Dmitri-Nastasya (friend), Zametov-Rodion (acquaintance), Dmitri-Praskovya (relation), and 1 more
story_summary: Raskolnikov, recovering from illness, gradually regains consciousness and interacts with Nastasya and a messenger from his office. Razumihin enters, revealing that Raskolnikov has been ill for days and has barely eaten. The messenger delivers a remittance of thirty-five roubles from Raskolnikov's mother, which he reluctantly signs for. As Raskolnikov begins to eat soup and drink tea, he observes the changes around him with a mix of astonishment and unease.
